Installation¶

The easiest way to install the code at the present time is to clone the repository, then create a conda/miniconda environment from the requirements.txt. To do this use the command:

conda create -n my_env_name --file requirements.txt

Once this is done creating, you should be able to run the code as long as this environment is active.

Docker¶

Code is also on Docker hub under the name tharrel4/mpdsf:thin. Usage of this version will not require any conda/miniconda environments, and can be used directly. The exact version of the code on Docker may not be completely up-to-date at all times, however.
